articles.title: Watch: PM Modi's Metro Ride On His Birthday, Selfies With Passengers - NDTV
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today took a ride in Delhi Metro after inaugurating the extension of the Airport Express line in Dwarka.
articles.content:
PM Modi also spoke to the staff of the Delhi Metro Rail Corporation (DMRC)
